name: He-ajax
tagline: Angularjs Ajax query helper directive. Part of https://github.com/vko-online/helium
body:
he-ajax ======= Part of [Helium](https://github.com/vko-online/helium) ###Angularjs ajax directive. Simple directive used to fetch data without writing any backend query request, as directive itself makes `$http` request to provided url, applies to scope or stright to DOM with specified `key` for response data. `he-ajax` is only for simple usage, implementation is strightforward simple, just makes our life a little bit easier. ###How to use Grab `he-ajax.js` file from dist folder. Then module dependency `helium` to your app module: ```html angular.module('myApp', ['helium']); ``` Don't forget to add `` to your main `index.html` file. And apply `he-ajax` attribute to any html element like `div, p, a, label` etc. That's all, dead-simple. Result will be promise which will be resolved and applied when data retrieved. Don't worry about FOC, althought directive is simple, it's smart enought and won't show it. ```html
``` Returns result and applies html element, consider request as plain string result. ```html
``` Consider request as object result. Note: `key` - will be applied to reponse data ```html

{{user.name}}

``` When data fetches, result applied to `scope.user`, then it can be used as any other scope model ###What else This directive was made to make easy access for user data, such as username, email, without any force, useful for static urls. Feel free to contribute/use, MIT license.
